content: Do you still have the old computer? it's always helpful to know there is a backup. Did you install the new thunderbird from thunderbird.net? Are these folders in the Local Folders in the old Thunderbird? Or in one of the accounts? Describe what you did and tell me if any of your data is now on the new PC? Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: I do still have the old computer but I had a horrible time unhooking the new and hooking the old stuff back up. I did install the new thunderbird from thunderbird.net. The only thing on the new computer is INBOX; DRAFT; SENT AND TRASH under the first email address. Under the second email address I had there all that came over is INBOX and TRASH. I hope I have answered what you were wanting to know. I'm so confused.

content: Click to 'account settings' and select an account as the default. When done, a star icon will appear to right of account name. This is a known bug.
creator: davidsk

content: Sorry for the bother, but maybe someone else has this problem. I just figured out that it is possible to pull down the image from the very top of the block. The line is invisible on my screen, but I noticed the little bar appeared as I moved the cursor.
